definition: (literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
the years have already gone by/to be too old

sentences.english: And justs sits there for ages untill i close it and try it again.
sentences.chinese: 只能无奈地坐在那蹉跎岁月，关了又开一试再试。

sentences.english: I slacked and learned a few survival skills.
sentences.chinese: 蹉跎中练就一身生存技能。

sentences.english: Music video by Iron Maiden performing Wasted Years.
sentences.chinese: 铁娘子执行蹉跎岁月的音乐录像。

sentences.english: A gorgeous dream in a year, waste goes with the scenery.
sentences.chinese: 一场华丽的梦随风而去，蹉跎以成一年风光。

sentences.english: O memory, hope, and love of finished years.
sentences.chinese: 我的回忆，希望与爱，在那些蹉跎的年岁。

sentences.english: This time with silly hair, enough of this life wasted.
sentences.chinese: 时刻这样发傻着，这日子够蹉跎。

sentences.english: If all my things are put off till tomorrow
sentences.chinese: 我生待明日，万事成蹉跎。

sentences.english: There glitters forever, like a useless star.
sentences.chinese: 永远像一颗蹉跎岁月的星星一样。

sentences.english: If all my things are put off till tomorrow, My time wasted to no purpose will brew woe。
sentences.chinese: 我生待明日，万事成蹉跎。

sentences.english: Every day in the reality dreams away.
sentences.chinese: 梦想每天都在现实中蹉跎。

sentences.english: A dream nobody cares, a Suigetsu mirror flower wasted.
sentences.chinese: 抗缆一场无人问津的梦，一场水月镜花的蹉跎。

sentences.english: Heavy stone house. 40 years ago, Shanghai young students of the wasted time spent here.
sentences.chinese: 沉重的石屋，上海知青40年前的蹉跎岁月。

sentences.english: Perhaps think with respect to such waste time years, actually this is irresponsible to this.
sentences.chinese: 或者想就这样蹉跎岁月，其实这是对自己的不负责任。

sentences.english: My dear friend, does not like me piddling away my time in the meaningless annoyance.
sentences.chinese: 朋友，不要像我这样，在无谓的烦恼中蹉跎了时光。

sentences.english: So I can not just helling around.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我不能这么蹉跎下去。

sentences.english: You should not dream your life away.
sentences.chinese: 你不要在空想中蹉跎一生。

definition: the passage of the years/the flow of time
to waste time on worthless activities
lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
